description.narrative: Output 7.1: Increased national capacity to provide equitable access to inclusive systems that protect children, adolescents and women from poverty, promote social inclusion and resilience to climate change and humanitarian crises.,which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 7: Improved policy environment and systems for disadvantaged and excluded children, guided by improved knowledge and data.

sector.narrative: Institutional strengthening/policy support/advocacy/education on integration of climate change concerns

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 7.1: Increased national capacity to provide equitable access to inclusive systems that protect children, adolescents and women from poverty, promote social inclusion and resilience to climate change and humanitarian crises.

description.narrative: National capacity in resilience and mitigation strategies to climate change were enhanced by capacitating and stimulating youth, children and institutions to lead in sustainable lifestyles, production in addressing community challenges. Climate change and environment were mainstreamed in UNICEF programmes and operations. In addition, 130 Students were retained on the Child Sensitive Social Policy Programme in Masters and PhD studies. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/01/2020

actual.value: 2020:29 green innovators, 20 Green Interns and 20 environmental clubs
